title: Unrevealing the potential of multicomponent metal-ion incorporation and sulfide modification in cobalt oxide for efficient water oxidation
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,2042-2050
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00327F, Paper

Muzzayab Masood, Muhammad Aamir, Muhammad Ejaz Khan, Muhammad Sher, Khush Bakhat Akram, Hafiz Zahid Shafi, Hamad Almohamadi, M. d. Akhtaruzzaman, M. d. Shahiduzzaman
The design and development of highly efficient electrocatalysts from transition metals have shown a great potential for substituting precious metal-based electrocatalysts in water-splitting processes.
